mapper.sql: ID, OPTIMISTIC, USER_NAME,CONTENT,CLIENT_TYPE,DEVICE_TOKEN,STATUS, JUMP_TYPE, H5_URL, LINK_URL, MODEL, PROPERTIES, VALS, CREATE_TIME
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into push_message (USER_NAME, CONTENT, CLIENT_TYPE,DEVICE_TOKEN, STATUS, JUMP_TYPE, H5_URL, LINK_URL, MODEL, PROPERTIES,VALS,CREATE_TIME) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deviceToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jumpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{h5Url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{properties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vals,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update push_message set OPTIMISTIC = OPTIMISTIC +1 , USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLIENT_TYPE = #{clientType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_TOKEN = #{deviceToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JUMP_TYPE = #{jumpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, H5_URL = #{h5Url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK_URL = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPERTIES = #{properties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALS = #{vals,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
